live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Teams remain on site working to resolve the issues in the area.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.

54613.summary: Some customers in the Kelvin Grove area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
54613.title: Oct 28 - Calgary (Kelvin Grove) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
